metaheuristics

Class WolfPackAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • metaheuristics.Solver
      • metaheuristics.WolfPackAlgorithm

  • public class WolfPackAlgorithm
extends Solver
    Implementation of the Wolf Pack metaheuristic, a new algorithm designed by Arthur Godet.
